{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Vector shapefile postprocessing

Steps in postprocessing:

  1. Drop all polygons that are within another polygon of a same class
  2. Merge all polygons of a same class that have IoU / IoA larger than (p1.union(p2))
